item.title: Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
I am seeking a skilled and creative video editor to join our remote team. As our YouTube Video Editor, you will be responsible for transforming raw footage into engaging and visually appealing videos that align with our brand and storytelling style. You will collaborate closely with the team to bring this channel to life and enhance viewer engagement. Please share relevant video examples.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 22:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
